nodes.text: RGA-972 was a Human male snowtrooper in the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. He had training in the use of many heavy weapons, including the E-Web heavy repeating blaster. In 3 ABY, after the Empire discovered a hidden Rebel base on the planet Hoth, RGA-972 participated in the subsequent ground assault against the Rebel Alliance, and invaded the Rebel base. RGA-972 served as an assault specialist. RGA-972 wore the standard suit of snowtrooper armor. He wielded an E-11 blaster rifle.
RGA-972 was created for a card in the Premiere set of Decipher's Jedi Knights Trading Card Game, released in 2001.
